statement.name: UPDATE_SMAAGR
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAAGR SET CODSPR=?, VLRAGR=?, OBJAGR=?, FCHAGR=?, DOBAGR=?, PLZAGR=?, TPOAGR=?, FCUAGR=?, TCNAGR=?, TCTAGR=? WHERE NROAGR=?

statement.name: INSERT_SMACAC
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMACAC (NROCAC, NROAGR, PTJCAC, VLRCAC, TPOCAC, PLZCAC, UPLCAC, CONCAC, SQLBKR) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAAGR_SAT
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAAGR SET RCBAGR=? WHERE NROAGR=?

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAAGR_UPL
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAAGR SET AOBAGR=? WHERE NROAGR=?

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAAGK
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAAGK SET TXTAGK=? WHERE NROAGK=?

statement.name: INSERT_SMAAGQ
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMAAGQ (NROAGQ, NROAGK, CODAGQ, CSCAGQ, SQLBKR) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)
